website_summaries.verdict: With a metal exterior and a plastic interior, this entry-level pasta maker is quite affordable.
pros: Externals are made primarily of stainless steel
cons: Some problems with durability/breakage and incomplete cutting of the noodles

customer_reviews.title: Good start for a beginner or occasional home pasta maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a really useful tool in my kitchen. It's frustrating to figure out when you're first using it (esp if your still an amature pasta maker, like me), but when it comes down to it, it gets the job done. It's not made out of the sturdiest materials, but it seems strong enougn to roll out my dough just fine. I opened it up to oil it, and it actually looks pretty simple and possibly even repairable (with some basic mechanical knowledge) if it happens to break.
customer_reviews.author: Ch. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Work up an appetite making your noodles!
customer_reviews.text: Use this pasta machine to make a few different things! It's a little bit of a pain and takes practice to use since it's a hand crank machine, but all in all gets the job done and is much more consistent than hand rolling. My only real complaint (and maybe it's something I'm doing wrong) lies with the spaghetti/linguini attachment. All the noodles stick together and you have to pull them apart by hand, which ruins most of them! Getting one bowl of spaghetti took me about 30 minutes. Overall, I am happy with this product and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality one
customer_reviews.text: The secret to making your own pasta is to have the dough the texture of PlayDough. That done this type of machine works the dough into the right consistency for cutting. This the machine does well. The reason for the 3 stars is that the cutting head does not stay on. The attachment methodology is very poor. I will be modifying it in my shop to see if I can get it to stay on. My only other complaint is minor but annoying, the crank handle does not have a detent to stay in place and constantly falls out of the machine while cranking.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product our 10-year-old was able to make pasta on ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product our 10-year-old was able to make pasta on his very first try. Makes noodles cheaper than Ramen noodles. Very high quality stainless steel. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Broccoli Rav! Beets Again!
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchase this baffled me. I had another one, a while back and thought, "hmmm no good"! After an hour or so with it! I was making Lasagna and Fettuccine like nobodies business! I think Ravioli is next on the docket..!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: It could have been a fluke, but the pasta maker we received didn't work properly. Instead of rotating the rollers to guide dough through, the crank caused the rollers to move in and out, thin and thick - which is supposed to be done with the knob on the side. We ended up returning it and paying a little bit more for a higher-quality brand (similar design) that works properly!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Griffin

customer_reviews.title: So easy no fuss or bother
customer_reviews.text: Broke my electric one so got this one. So easy no fuss or bother. Had my pasta already made. Just flattened it with a rolling pin, put the pasta on #1 and rolled it out, kept rolling it at #1 trying to make it a rectangle (cut edges and put in the middle of the piece.) then increased to #2, etc. When right thickness cut with one of the two cutters. I cook right away- 3 to 5 minutes, So light with no additives.
customer_reviews.author: P. Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift with all you need for a meal in a basket with some red wine for a shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated Gave it as a gift. I get barrilla to make my pasta. I’m handicapped and it’s just too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula Baltzer

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheap and shoddy, not well made
customer_reviews.text: This pasta machine began to break down almost immediately with light use after I recieved it. The gears started to click loudly and turning it actually became harder. I ended up returning the pasta machine and purchasing a different brand which I'm very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Jerad Muller

customer_reviews.title: The pasta maker for us.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé at Christmas time. He loves it. I love it. It's such an interesting tool and it works well. We've made homemade pasta at home a few times now and it only gets better! The pasta maker feeds the dough through it easily. If you are looking for an affordable pasta maker I recommend this one! We haven't had any trouble with it.
customer_reviews.author: Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This works great for the most part. Was a little disappointed when I got it and there was some "rattling" noise going on. Hubby had to take apart and find the loose screw and nut and put it back together before the first use.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysABusyBee

customer_reviews.title: Ok - but not washable - duh!
customer_reviews.text: This worked quite well for it being a manual maker. I bought it to make pasta with my grandchildren. I was amazed to see that I cannot wash it. Brushing it does not seem like I will get it clean properly. Is that the norm for pasta makers? Why don't they make it so that it can be washed?
customer_reviews.author: G. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good product, light, turns just fine, just be sure not to overpack the pasta into it. Homemade pasta always tastes the best. If you have a wooden countertop or do a lot of cooking, perhaps drilling this onto the corner of your table / prep-table would help as you could use one hand to turn the wheel and the other to guide your pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bodin

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Especially For the Money.
customer_reviews.text: This works great and seems to roll the pasta out evenly and cut it well. I just wish it latched on to a hard surface better. It tends to move and come undone before too long and with too much use, otherwise, this works pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: kindlemom1 (My Guilty Obsession Blog)

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size and very easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this before I got my kitchen aid mixer and it did the job. It's a great size and very easy to store. I would recommend it to anyone who's just starting to roll pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck pasta roller
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck pasta roller. The instructions suck but once you get used to your pasta turns out amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter in law -- she had a difficult time putting it together so she does't use it! Oh well, I guess it is the thought that counts. I would not biy this again
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, but don't buy if you're serious about pasta
customer_reviews.text: Basic. Good if you want to see if making pasta is for you, but I found the wider noodle size didn't cut the pasta well. If you like making pasta, you'll want to spend money on a better machine.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a fun 'date night' making homemade pasta. The only negative is one of the cutters - just one small section of the fettuccini cutter isn't sharp enough so the dough sticks.
customer_reviews.author: nimett1

customer_reviews.title: Metal parts VERY sharp
customer_reviews.text: To be fair I only purchased this initially to roll fondant for cake decoration. My 3 stars is based on the fact that I cut my finger wide open trying to clean off the rollers - be VERY CAREFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: chicago

customer_reviews.title: ... had a chance to use this and it works fine. Am a little concerned that it says you ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to use this and it works fine. Am a little concerned that it says you can't really wash it, you can only brush off the excess flour. Wondering if it will start to smell after a while?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: total waste of money.  Rollers started flaking into the product the very first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Rey first time I used it the rollers started flaking some sort of chrome coating off, leaving little flakes of metallic stuff in the material I was rolling. So much for 'stainless steel construction'.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & IceCream

customer_reviews.title: Hard to turn
customer_reviews.text: It works okay but if my hands had been weak it would be to hard to turn. You must have a medium to more upper body strength or you can't turn it. Made noodles as expected. Arrived on-time and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Turner

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Granddaughter to use for conditioning polymer clay. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Filan

customer_reviews.title: I was SO happy to use this at first
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products where you get what you pay for. I was SO happy to use this at first. It worked well for the first 5 uses but by use number 6, it was starting to get rusted and more difficult to crank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to start using this inexpensive pasta maker... But quickly realized it's not worth the low price. The circular knob on the side broke off right after I started using it, making the machine unusable. You're gonna have to invest in something better quality if you really want to make pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm very new at making pasta, but this machine makes it easy. I'm sure if I had read the instructions, it would have gone smoother, but eh, who likes to spend time reading instructions. lol
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Castaldo

customer_reviews.title: ... make homemade pasta and I wanted my own I love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I learned in school how to make homemade pasta and I wanted my own I love it
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: I liked the tracking I knew where it was at all ...
customer_reviews.text: My mother finally has her own pasta maker!!!! It arrived on time.I liked the tracking I knew where it was at all times . It's easy to use.And above all my mother is happily making her own pasta. I should have bought the suggested pasta holder tho.
customer_reviews.author: mirna river

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and packaged well, my bf and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and packaged well, my bf and I attempted to make pasta and failed miserably but from our own incompetence. The machine worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: They did love the home-made pasta but need a sturdier machine
customer_reviews.text: Had some loose nuts that fell off inside unit in shipping. I had left town and the unit broke (thickness adjustment knob stripped out) on the first try when my wife and kids tried using it to test out before I returned. They did love the home-made pasta but need a sturdier machine. Will try and fix it and give it away. Bought an Atlas 150 Wellness machine locally.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used several times to roll out cheese cracker dough. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Love making fresh pasta would have 5 stars but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love making fresh pasta would have 5 stars but it sounds like bearings are out of place it rattles and works fine for now but I don't think it's going to last for years
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Buy something better
customer_reviews.text: The roller works fine but the cutters don't work at all. The pasta will come out uncut or get stuck inside the gears.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A

customer_reviews.title: ... stuck sometimes and needs some stubborn cleaning but overall great product.
customer_reviews.text: Dough gets stuck sometimes and needs some stubborn cleaning but overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: I love this pasta maker I also use it to roll ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta maker I also use it to roll out other types of dough for pastries and they come out great.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a month. Don't waste your time and spend a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Ciastko

customer_reviews.title: but company was great, refunded immediately
customer_reviews.text: very unhappy, broke right away, but company was great, refunded immediately, product is terrible though
customer_reviews.author: v f

customer_reviews.title: Never buying pre-made pasta again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pasta maker!!! I took it out of box and assembled it without reading the instructions... Super easy to use and the pasta I made impressed my entire family. Definitely a must have kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Khayla Banks

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I use this all the time. We make pasta and ravioli often! Its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: ... had no idea making pasta could be so much fun and so easy
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea making pasta could be so much fun and so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: When I used it for the first time, it was a little damaged, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: YU

customer_reviews.title: good on its face
customer_reviews.text: seems nice. i haven't used it yet, but it's clearly a solid apparatus and seems to function fine.
customer_reviews.author: nemo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta makers easy to use very well-made will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Pat OBryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's weight in gold.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built pasta maker. Shipping was fast, and it was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty product, but I don't have a sturdy place to clamp it.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaO

customer_reviews.title: For someone who had never used a pasta machine it wasn't that easy to figure out
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the machine only came with a picture diagram, no wording for instructions. For someone who had never used a pasta machine it wasn't that easy to figure out. The feature I like the least is the knob that changes the thickness of the pasta---hard to adjust, especially with floury hands.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy piece of equipment... I was a bit thrown off by the packaging; plain white box with no label or anything so this might not work for you if you are planning to give this as a gift. Instructions included.
customer_reviews.author: Chante Calzada

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a great pasta maker. I gave it 3 stars because it doesn't cut the pasta properly, you have to separate the pasta by hand and sometimes the pasta sheets get stuck in the sides of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: God's Princess

customer_reviews.title: Does the same job as the expensive machines.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of machinery and the price is right. Now if I could just remember who I loaned the last pasta machine to I would have two!
customer_reviews.author: BKKExpat

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband, and it arrived broken, there's no option to return the item :/
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Definitely worth the price and investing in one. The only thing that I don't like is that you can't adjust the size for the pasta noodles unless there is a way and I haven't figure it out yet. But definitely useful and works great. Came in exactly like how it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Pa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my wife wanted and at a price she likes.

customer_reviews.title: Fondant roller
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to help thin fondant. It works perfect. The handle falling out if bumped is aggrivating though.

customer_reviews.title: which makes it completely useless. The build quality on the machine itself (which ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine arrived without a crank or c clamp, which makes it completely useless. The build quality on the machine itself (which is the only thing to which I can attest), is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Graham L.

customer_reviews.title: Requires some practice and good coordination but overall this is a pretty nice product
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Requires some practice and good coordination but overall this is a pretty nice product.

customer_reviews.title: I have been making pasta for years and never had a machine that was junk like this.
customer_reviews.text: PIECE OF JUNK!! Rolls pasta ok but does not cut noodles. I have been making pasta for years and never had a machine that was junk like this.

customer_reviews.title: Spend more for the real thing
customer_reviews.text: POOR QUALITY - broke immediately - you turn the crank but the drums no longer spin

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This broke during the second use. I would not recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice and both times it didnt come with the pasta cutting attachment. 0/10

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: We use it to make noodles, the roller part works okay, the cutter doesn't cut through, the noodles sticks together. I dont recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmyx

customer_reviews.title: this was awesomely great! I bought this for my husband until I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this was awesomely great! I bought this for my husband until I could afford the Bosch attachments he really wanted, they certainly kept him busy until that happened. It's a bit flimsy, and not the highest quality pasta cutter/roller you would buy to last forever, but it did he job and we were very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pastino magnifico
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what else you could possibly want from a 25 dollar pasta maker. Just make sure to get free shipping because it is HEAVY(in a good way)

customer_reviews.title: When I opened my pasta maker I found that it ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my pasta maker I found that it did not have the handle or a clamp. It makes it hard to use the product.

customer_reviews.text: Literally broke within my first use. I had it for less than an hour before it broke. This product is not worth the low price.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I get this pasta maker and the first thing I see is the attachment is damaged. So I didn't even used it. I was very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. My only complaint is that the c-clamp isn't large enough to fit onto a standard size prep table.

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed working with this pasta marker
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed working with this pasta marker. Stores away nicely, and not to hard to clean up after using.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely horrible... Used it twice and the selector knob is broken...

customer_reviews.title: Love it. easy to use with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Love it. easy to use with reasonable price. I recommend to many of my friends --- they love it as well.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on Second Use
customer_reviews.text: This item broke on the second use. The handle popped out (has spring/not able to put handle back in). Very disappointing. I was going to use the easy returns, but the label expired just a few days after I printed it, before I had a chance to package the item back up. Now I have an item that was used one and a half times that is going into the trash. Service/delivery was quick, just the product was a waste of money. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn McGrath

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't roll out the pretty, sheets in the picture. Thing like to drove me crazy. Sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: It came to my house in a damaged box and ...
customer_reviews.text: It came to my house in a damaged box and the device itself was damaged. It was crooked and seemed very cheaply made. The crank wouldn't turn correctly. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: R.Lyons

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: I used it two times. The first time the pasta slicer part wouldn't work. The second time the whole thing broke. The knob to adjust thickness just stopped working. Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Can be shaky if your not careful about your cranking...

customer_reviews.title: 1st time pasta maker!!
customer_reviews.text: First time making homemade pasta and it worked great. I recommend this product for first time pasta makers, it cut good as well no issues with that.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!!! NO DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS WITH PHOTOS. YOU HAVE TO BE A ROCKET SCIENTIST TO FIGURE OUT HOW TO MAKE PASTA. WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tinalat

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is a really good machine if it was built properly
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a really good machine if it was built properly, the attachment wasn't put together properly and is useless to me as it doesn't make spaghetti of any kind, when I removed the attachment it rattled which not knowing it shouldn't I thought it was normal. I would've sent it back but had throwen the packaging away days before, thinking of buying one of the up graded models.
customer_reviews.author: Elton Carter

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. When I opened it, there was a bar that was loose on the part that cuts the pasta. I tried to fix it and the the whole thing pretty much fell apart. The clamp didn't hold it in place well enough. The instructions were poorly written and didn't explain at all how to make any pasta other then fettuccine or spaghetti. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: Epic Fail
customer_reviews.text: This machine is junk. Poorly constructed and inferior metal. It fell apart the first time I tried to use it. I was a professional chef for years, and I used pasta machines frequently, so it was not user error.The machine looks great online, but please do not purchase! Amazon was very speedy in refunding my purchase and returning was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bisaillon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It worked great.. I made fetuccine the first day I got it.. Fist time making pasta not a problem at all.!
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: It works great for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little pasta maker to use with my polymer clay crafting. It works great for what I use it for. It's easy to set up and and to clean. I'm sure it would be just fine for pasta (but mine is dedicated to clay).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gotta read reviews of other ones and try to find a good one. a few dollars more might get a ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this for my daughter to make a german dish, to avoid rolling dough forever. the first one was missing or had broken items. so i got it replaced, send it all the way to from Texas to California, just for her to tell me it doesn't work either. in the meantime it's back here in texas and i myself can't do anything with it. guess it's trash. gotta read reviews of other ones and try to find a good one. a few dollars more might get a much better item than cheap and not working.
customer_reviews.author: G.Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional chef, I make pasta almost every day. I bought this to use at home occasionally. I used it once, the handle wouldn't stay in, the clamp wouldn't stay tight, the cutter didn't cut the dough completely. I can't imagine how this product could be worse. The rollers are bent from me tossing it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Penge567

customer_reviews.title: Rolls the dough out nice. I loved that the press has 9 settings
customer_reviews.text: If you are new to making homemade pasta then this is for you. Rolls the dough out nice. I loved that the press has 9 settings. So you can start at 1 for a thicker dough. And work your way to a 9 which is very thin. I would Definitely buy this product again. the one draw back. I wish there was better design in the clamp to hold the base to the counter or table. It seems if you put it to tight the other side of the machine raises up. i was able to find a good balance. But it was after trial and error. Over all A good product for the price Paid.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hill

product_meta.title: Meglio AEPM01 Pro Traditional-Style Pasta Maker
product_meta.description: AEPM01 Features: -Heavy-duty stainless steel construction. -Adjustable rollers for variable thickness. -Rolls and slices dough. -Makes spaghetti, fettuccine, lasagna and ravioli. Product Type: -Pasta maker. Color: -Stainless Steel. Adjustable Thickness: -Yes. Attachment Included: -Yes. Operation: -Manual. Primary Material: -Metal. Dimensions: Overall Product Weight: -4 lbs.
feature_bullets: Adjustable rollers for variable thickness, rolls and slices dough
Includes a C-clamp to fasten the machine securely to tables or workstations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars387 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
